mapper.select: SELECT id AS store_id, address AS store_address, ST_X(location) AS longitude, ST_Y(location) AS latitude, ST_Distance_Sphere( location, POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}) ) AS distance FROM store WHERE opened = true AND MBRContains( ST_Buffer( POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}), 500/111195 ), location ) ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 5
